DOC.detailed_description: The propose randomized control trial test safety efficacy combination therapy sodium nitrite isoquercetin endothelial function inflammation among patient chronic kidney disease . Investigators recruit 70 albuminuric CKD patient randomly assign participant combination therapy sodium nitrite isoquercetin placebo three month .
